name: Strength
description: Increases carrying capacity for scavenging, boosts melee damage, and improves endurance for physical tasks like cleanup.

name: Speed
description: Reduces action and travel time for tasks like exploration, improves dodge chance in combat, and aids in escaping dangers.

name: Intelligence
description: Speeds up skill learning, unlocks advanced tasks like complex crafting, and improves problem-solving efficiency.

name: Resilience
description: Increases health, reduces injury and disease risks, and slows morale loss from low food or harsh conditions.
